books.author: by Charlaine Harris
books.description: The telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse searches for the truth about the death of the former barmaid Arlene.
books.name: DEAD EVER AFTER

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Lucas Davenport is drawn into the investigation of a Minnesota political scandal and the disappearance of an operative.
books.name: SILKEN PREY

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The government hitman Will Robie uncovers a serious threat as he attempts to take out a fellow assassin who has gone rogue.
books.name: THE HIT

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: A week after giving birth, Detective Lindsay Boxer returns to work to investigate some grisly murders.
books.name: 12TH OF NEVER

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A former criminal attorney who has been acquitted of his wife’s murder retreats to his family estate on a rocky New England cliff, where he is comforted by the house’s caretaker amid continuing danger.
books.name: WHISKEY BEACH

books.author: by Rachel Van Dyken
books.description: A Seattle millionaire asks a childhood friend to pretend to be engaged to him. But she reckoned without his brother.
books.name: THE BET

books.author: by Richard Paul Evans
books.description: In the fourth book of the “Walk” series, Alan faces new challenges on his walk to Key West.
books.name: A STEP OF FAITH

books.author: by Judith Merkle Riley
books.description: In 17th-century France, a fortuneteller hides more behind her black robes than people know.
books.name: THE ORACLE GLASS

books.author: by John le Carre
books.description: A young man investigates a private-public antiterrorist operation, supposedly a great success but actually a disaster.
books.name: A DELICATE TRUTH

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Barbara Freethy
books.description: A reckless photographer helps a woman delve into the mysteries of her past.
books.name: DON'T SAY A WORD

books.author: by Matthew Quick
books.description: A man recently released from a mental institution has two obsessions: his estranged wife and the Philadelphia Eagles. The basis of the movie.
books.name: THE SILVER LININGS PLAYBOOK

books.author: by Orson Scott Card
books.description: Government agencies breed child geniuses and train them as soldiers.
books.name: ENDER'S GAME

books.author: by  Samantha Young
books.description: For once, a woman is tempted to put her own needs above her dependent younger brother’s.
books.name: DOWN LONDON ROAD

books.author: by Ann Patchett
books.description: A widow unravels her dead husband’s secrets. First published in 1997.
books.name: THE MAGICIAN'S ASSISTANT
